EmailTemplate.subject: LAST CHANCE TO REGISTER - Webinar August 30: How to Get Your Crews to Document Effectively
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> LAST CHANCE TO REGISTER
How to Get Your Crews to Document Effectively
Presenting: Doug Wolfberg of Page, Wolberg, and Wirth COMPLIMENTARY LIVE WEBINAR Approved for 1 NAAC CEU Please join us for the upcoming webinar on August 30, at 2 pm Eastern Time (1 pm CT | Noon MT | 11 am PT): One of the most-requested PWW presentations! Learn effective strategies for improving crew documentation – from implementing an effective chart review/QA process, to designing creative training approaches, to utilizing incentive and mentoring programs, and making the most out of electronic documentation solutions. This session will present real-world strategies to help solve this age-old problem.
Presenting: Doug Wolfberg <http://www.pwwemslaw.com/CMS/uploads/File/Staff%20Bios%20updated%204%206%202012/Doug%20Wolfberg%202012.pdf> of Page, Wolfberg and Wirth
<http://offers.tritech.com/August30Webinar.html>
If you are unable to view the Register button above, please copy and paste the following URL into any web browser: http://offers.tritech.com/August30Webinar.html
